monsters.name: big rat
monsters.description: A filthy large rat with beady eyes and glistening teeth

monsters.name: purple slime
monsters.description: An oozy, slimy, purplish blob with ill intent the size of a large dog

monsters.name: goblin
monsters.description: A small, green-skinned humanoid with a wicked grin and sharp claws

monsters.name: skeleton
monsters.description: A reanimated skeleton with a rusty sword and hollow eye sockets

monsters.name: orc
monsters.description: A brutish, muscular humanoid with green skin and a savage demeanor

monsters.name: giant spider
monsters.description: A hairy, eight-legged monstrosity with venomous fangs and a web-spinning ability

monsters.name: zombie
monsters.description: A decaying, mindless creature that craves human flesh and spreads a foul stench

monsters.name: skeleton mage
monsters.description: A skeletal figure dressed in tattered robes, wielding dark magic

monsters.name: wraith
monsters.description: A ghostly apparition with a malevolent aura, capable of draining life force

monsters.name: ogre
monsters.description: A hulking giant with green skin, immense strength, and a simple-minded nature

monsters.name: werewolf
monsters.description: A half-human, half-wolf creature with heightened senses and razor-sharp claws

monsters.name: gargoyle
monsters.description: A stone-like creature with wings and a menacing expression, capable of flight

monsters.name: minotaur
monsters.description: A powerful humanoid with the head of a bull and a large, muscular body

monsters.name: medusa
monsters.description: A serpent-haired woman with a petrifying gaze and a taste for tragedy

monsters.name: vampire
monsters.description: An immortal creature that feeds on blood, possesses supernatural abilities

monsters.name: sorcerer
monsters.description: A master of arcane magic, capable of casting devastating spells

monsters.name: elemental
monsters.description: A creature born of the elements, wielding power over fire, water, earth, or air

monsters.name: griffon
monsters.description: A majestic creature with the body of a lion and the wings of an eagle

monsters.name: golem
monsters.description: A construct made of stone or metal, animated by magic or ancient rituals

monsters.name: wyvern
monsters.description: A dragon-like creature with two legs, wings, and a venomous stinger

monsters.name: manticore
monsters.description: A fearsome creature with the body of a lion, wings of a bat, and tail of a scorpion

monsters.name: giant
monsters.description: An enormous humanoid with incredible strength and towering presence

monsters.name: demon
monsters.description: A malevolent entity from the depths of the netherworld, wielding dark powers

monsters.name: lich
monsters.description: An undead sorcerer who has achieved immortality by storing their soul in a phylactery

monsters.name: dragon
monsters.description: A powerful, fire-breathing creature with scales, wings, and a long tail

monsters.name: kraken
monsters.description: A gigantic sea monster with multiple tentacles, capable of sinking ships

monsters.name: behemoth
monsters.description: A colossal creature with immense strength and thick, impenetrable skin

monsters.name: phoenix
monsters.description: A majestic bird of fire, reborn from its ashes with fiery regenerative abilities

monsters.name: leviathan
monsters.description: A massive sea serpent with impenetrable scales, capable of causing massive tidal waves

monsters.name: titans
monsters.description: Ancient and powerful beings of immense size and strength, capable of toppling mountains

monsters.name: elder dragon
monsters.description: A legendary dragon of immense age and power, with wisdom and devastating breath

monsters.name: celestial being
monsters.description: A divine entity from the heavens, radiating celestial light and possessing godlike abilities

monsters.name: demon lord
monsters.description: A powerful ruler of the underworld, commanding legions of demons and dark forces

monsters.name: immortal
monsters.description: A being unaffected by time and age, possessing unparalleled knowledge and abilities

monsters.name: eldritch horror
monsters.description: A cosmic abomination from beyond the realms of existence, defying comprehension

monsters.name: red dragon
monsters.description: The epitome of draconic power, breathing fire and reigning over mountains of gold
